TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TrackingParticipant extends System.Object

summary.span: 与工作流跟踪基础结构交互并访问跟踪记录的工作流扩展的基类。

span.span: The base class for workflow extensions that interact with the workflow tracking infrastructure and access tracking records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 注册了一个跟踪参与者来接收跟踪记录。A tracking participant is registered to receive tracking records. 当前，任何实现该跟踪参与者的类都可向工作流实例注册来接收跟踪记录。Currently, any class that implements the tracking participant can be registered with the workflow instance to receive tracking records. 如果跟踪参与者是第三方代码，请确保此代码不是恶意代码。If the tracking participant is third party code, ensure that this is not malicious code. 跟踪参与者与工作流实例运行在同一进程中，如果存在恶意跟踪参与者，此代码将影响总体工作流执行。The tracking participants run in the same process as the workflow instance and in the case of malicious tracking participants, this code could affect the overall workflow execution. 跟踪记录将在工作流执行时传递到注册的跟踪参与者，因此开发人员应确保该跟踪参与者不会因为在跟踪方法内执行意外的操作而影响正在运行的工作流。The tracking records are delivered to the registered tracking participants as the workflow executes, so the developer should ensure that the tracking participant does not affect the running workflow by performing unintended operations within the track method. 此情况的示例可能包括更改工作流变量或花费很长时间的操作。Examples of this could be the alteration of workflow variables or operations that take a long time.

MemberSignature.Value: protected TrackingParticipant ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: TrackingParticipant();

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，创建派生类的新实例。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, creates a new instance of the derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual IAsyncResult BeginTrack (System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingRecord record, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginTrack(class System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingRecord record, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function BeginTrack (record As TrackingRecord, timeout As TimeSpan, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
protected public: virtual IAsyncResult ^ BeginTrack(System::Activities::Tracking::TrackingRecord ^ record, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: timeout
param.span: 时间段，在该时间段后提供程序将中止尝试。

span.span: The time period after which the provider aborts the attempt.

param.name: callback
param.span: 要在操作完成时调用的方法。

span.span: The method to be called on completion of the operation.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个用户定义的对象，该对象唯一标识此异步操作。

span.span: A user-defined object that uniquely identifies this asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，开始跟踪记录的异步处理。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, begins asynchronous processing of the tracking record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参与者应开始处理记录的作业，并返回工作流运行时用于等待完成的 。Participants are expected to begin a job to process the records and return an that the workflow runtime uses to wait for completion. 默认实现是调用 并返回 Completed 状态。The default implementation is to call and return a Completed status.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void EndTrack (IAsyncResult result);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndTrack(class System.IAsyncResult result) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub EndTrack (result As IAsyncResult)
protected public: virtual void EndTrack(IAsyncResult ^ result);

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，表示异步跟踪操作结束。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, represents the end of an asynchronous tracking operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应一直阻止到跟踪操作完成为止。This method is expected to block until the tracking operation is complete.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract void Track (System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingRecord record, TimeSpan timeout);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Track(class System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingRecord record, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Protected Friend MustOverride Sub Track (record As TrackingRecord, timeout As TimeSpan)
protected public: abstract void Track(System::Activities::Tracking::TrackingRecord ^ record, TimeSpan timeout);

param.name: timeout
param.span: 时间段，在该时间段后提供程序将中止尝试。

span.span: The time period after which the provider aborts the attempt.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，用于以异步方式处理跟踪记录。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, used to synchronously process the tracking record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当工作流实例发出跟踪记录时，将调用跟踪方法。The track method is called when the workflow instance emits a tracking record.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingProfile TrackingProfile { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingProfile TrackingProfile
Public Overridable Property TrackingProfile As TrackingProfile

public: virtual property System::Activities::Tracking::TrackingProfile ^ TrackingProfile { System::Activities::Tracking::TrackingProfile ^ get(); void set(System::Activities::Tracking::TrackingProfile ^ value); };

summary.span: 跟踪参与者使用的跟踪配置文件对象。

span.span: The tracking profile object used by the tracking participant.

summary.span: 将跟踪参与者添加到工作流扩展之前，将在参与者上设置跟踪配置文件。

span.span: Before adding the tracking participant to the workflow extensions, the tracking profile is set on the participant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪配置文件定义将哪些跟踪事件发送到此跟踪参与者。The tracking profile defines which tracking events are sent to this tracking participant.
